mapper.sql: id, name, table_code, group, desc, createId, ts
mapper.delete: delete from config_table where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ts=${ts}
mapper.insert: insert into config_table (id, name, table_code, group, desc, createId, ts) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now())

insert into config_table
id,
name,
table_code,
group,
desc,
createId,
ts,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update config_table
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_code = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createId = #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ts = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ts=#{ts}

update config_table set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_code = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createId = #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ts = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and and ts=#{ts}
